code.name: Container, flexible
code.description: A packaging container of flexible construction.

code.name: Pallet ISO 0 - 1/2 EURO Pallet (GS1 Code)
code.description: Standard pallet with dimensions 80 X 60 cm.

code.name: Pallet ISO 1 - 1/1 EURO Pallet (GS1 Code)
code.description: Standard pallet with dimensions 80 X 120 cm.

code.name: Pallet ISO 2 – 2/1 EURO Pallet (GS1 Code)
code.description: Standard pallet with dimensions 100 X 120 cm.

code.name: 1/4 EURO Pallet (GS1 Code)
code.description: Standard pallet with dimensions 60 X 40 cm.

code.name: 1/8 EURO Pallet (GS1 Code)
code.description: Standard pallet with dimensions 40 X 30 cm.

code.name: Synthetic pallet ISO 1 (GS1 Code)
code.description: A standard pallet with standard dimensions 80*120cm made of a synthetic material for hygienic reasons.

code.name: Synthetic pallet ISO 2 (GS1 Code)
code.description: A standard pallet with standard dimensions 100*120cm made of a synthetic material for hygienic reasons.

code.name: Wholesaler pallet (GS1 Code)
code.description: Pallet provided by the wholesaler.

code.name: Pallet 80 X 100 cm (GS1 Code)
code.description: Pallet with dimensions 80 X 100 cm.

code.name: Pallet 60 X 100 cm (GS1 Code)
code.description: Pallet with dimensions 60 X 100 cm.

code.name: Bag, super bulk
code.description: A cloth plastic or paper based bag having the dimensions of the pallet on which it is constructed.

code.name: Bag, polybag
code.description: A type of plastic bag, typically used to wrap promotional pieces, publications, product samples, and/or catalogues.

code.name: Case, car
code.description: A type of portable container designed to store equipment for carriage in an automobile.

code.name: Case, wooden
code.description: A case made of wood for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Oneway pallet (GS1 Code)
code.description: Pallet need not be returned to the point of expedition

code.name: Pallet, wooden
code.description: A platform or open-ended box, made of wood, on which goods are retained for ease of mechanical handling during transport and storage.

code.name: Crate, wooden
code.description: A receptacle, made of wood, on which goods are retained for ease of mechanical handling during transport and storage.

code.name: Bundle, wooden
code.description: Loose or unpacked pieces of wood tied or wrapped together.

code.name: Returnable pallet (GS1 Code)
code.description: Pallet must be returned to the point of expedition.

code.name: Receptacle, fibre
code.description: Containment vessel made of fibre used for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Receptacle, paper
code.description: Containment vessel made of paper for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Receptacle, wooden
code.description: Containment vessel made of wood for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Pallet, modular, collars 80cms * 60cms
code.description: Standard sized pallet of dimensions 80 centimeters by 60 centimeters (cms).

code.name: Pallet, shrinkwrapped
code.description: Pallet load secured with transparent plastic film that has been wrapped around and then shrunk tightly.

code.name: Pallet, 100cms * 110cms
code.description: Standard sized pallet of dimensions 100centimeters by 110 centimeters (cms).

code.name: Clamshell
code.description: GS1 Description: A package with a base and top that are hinged together. E.g. video cassette case.

code.name: Cone
code.description: Container used in the transport of linear material such as yarn.

code.name: Ball
code.description: A spherical containment vessel for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Aluminium packed (GS1 Code)
code.description: Packaging using thin sheets of aluminium.

code.name: Belt
code.description: A band use to retain multiple articles together.

code.name: Bag
code.description: A receptacle made of flexible material with an open or closed top.

code.name: Large bag, pallet sized (GS1 Code)
code.description: A non-rigid container made of fabric, paper, plastic, etc, with an opening at the top which can be closed and which is suitable for use on pallets.

code.name: Blister pack (GS1 Code)
code.description: A transparent strip package of pressable plastic which allows the product to be displayed while remaining protected.

code.name: Bottle, non-protected, cylindrical
code.description: A narrow-necked cylindrical shaped vessel without external protective packing material.

code.name: Bottle, protected cylindrical
code.description: A narrow-necked cylindrical shaped vessel with external protective packing material.

code.name: Brick (GS1 Code)
code.description: A box made of a cardboard, plastic or metal, used for liquids.

code.name: Bottle, non-protected, bulbous
code.description: A narrow-necked bulb shaped vessel without external protective packing material.

code.name: Bottle, protected bulbous
code.description: A narrow-necked bulb shaped vessel with external protective packing material.

code.name: Container bottle like (GS1 Code)
code.description: A non-protected, non-cylindrical, container with a narrow neck made usually of glass or plastic which is especially used for liquids, e.g. perfume bottle.

code.name: Cardboard carrier (GS1 Code)
code.description: A package made of cardboard.

code.name: Can, with handle and spout
code.description: GS1 Description: A can with a handle and spout which allows the lifting and pouring of liquids contained within the can

code.name: Card
code.description: A flat package usually made of fibreboard from/to which product is often hung or attached.

code.name: Container, not otherwise specified as transport equipment
code.description: GS1 Description: A receptacle in which something is kept and/or transported.

code.name: Cartridge
code.description: Package containing a charge such as propelling explosive for firearms or ink toner for a printer.

code.name: Crate, multiple layer, plastic
code.description: GS1 Description: Plastic crate which contains multiple layers.

code.name: Crate, multiple layer, wooden
code.description: GS1 Description: Wooden crate which contains multiple layers.

code.name: Box, Commonwealth Handling Equipment Pool (CHEP), Eurobox
code.description: A box mounted on a pallet base under the control of CHEP.

code.name: Display package (GS1 Code)
code.description: A package used for the display of goods, usually during a promotion.

code.name: Tray, one layer no cover, plastic
Tray, one layer no cover, wooden
Tray, one layer no cover, polystyrene
Tray, one layer no cover, cardboard
Tray, two layers no cover, plastic tray
Tray, two layers no cover, wooden
Tray, two layers no cover, cardboard
Flexibag
code.description: A flexible containment bag made of plastic, typically for the transportation bulk non-hazardous cargoes using standard size shipping containers.

code.name: Flexitank
code.description: A flexible containment tank made of plastic, typically for the transportation bulk non-hazardous cargoes using standard size shipping containers.

code.name: Folding box (GS1 Code)
code.description: Folded cardboard box e.g. for products like frozen vegetables, paper clips.

code.name: Foil packed (GS1 Code)
code.description: Packaging using a metallic foil.

code.name: Cart, flatbed
code.description: Wheeled flat bedded device on which trays or other regular shaped items are packed for transportation purposes.

code.name: Bottle, gas
code.description: A narrow-necked metal cylinder for retention of liquefied or compressed gas.

code.name: Container, gallon
code.description: A container with a capacity of one gallon.

code.name: Receptacle, glass
code.description: Containment vessel made of glass for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Tray, containing horizontally stacked flat items
code.description: Tray containing flat items stacked on top of one another.

code.name: Bag, gunny
code.description: A sack made of gunny or burlap, used for transporting coarse commodities, such as grains, potatoes, and other agricultural products.

code.name: Hanger
code.description: A purpose shaped device with a hook at the top for hanging items from a rail.

code.name: Package, flow
code.description: A flexible tubular package or skin, possibly transparent, often used for containment of foodstuffs (e.g. salami sausage).

code.name: Package, cardboard, with bottle grip-holes
code.description: Packaging material made out of cardboard that facilitates the separation of individual glass or plastic bottles.

code.name: Tray, rigid, lidded stackable (CEN TS 14482:2002)
code.description: Lidded stackable rigid tray compliant with CEN TS 14482:2002.

code.name: Bag, jumbo
code.description: A flexible containment bag, widely used for storage, transportation and handling of powder, flake or granular materials. Typically constructed from woven polypropylene (PP) fabric in the form of cubic bags.

code.name: Kit
code.description: A set of articles or implements used for a specific purpose.

code.name: Labeled package (GS1 Code)
code.description: The package is labeled. Usually the label identifies the name, brand or description of the product within the package.

code.name: Luggage
code.description: A collection of bags, cases and/or containers which hold personal belongings for a journey.

code.name: Lug
code.description: A wooden box for the transportation and storage of fruit or vegetables.

code.name: Liftvan
code.description: A wooden or metal container used for packing household goods and personal effects.

code.name: Crate, metal
code.description: Containment box made of metal for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Container, metal
code.description: A type of containment box made of metal for retaining substances or articles, not otherwise specified as transport equipment.

code.name: Multipack (GS1 Code)
code.description: A container for the merchandising of multiple units of the same product.

code.name: Receptacle, metal
code.description: Containment vessel made of metal for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Receptacle, plastic wrapped
code.description: Containment vessel wrapped with plastic for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Pallet, CHEP 40 cm x 60 cm
code.description: Commonwealth Handling Equipment Pool (CHEP) standard pallet of dimensions 40 centimeters x 60 centimeters.

code.name: Pallet, CHEP 80 cm x 120 cm
code.description: Commonwealth Handling Equipment Pool (CHEP) standard pallet of dimensions 80 centimeters x 120 centimeters.

code.name: Pallet, CHEP 100 cm x 120 cm
code.description: Commonwealth Handling Equipment Pool (CHEP) standard pallet of dimensions 100 centimeters x 120 centimeters.

code.name: Pallet, AS 4068-1993
code.description: Australian standard pallet of dimensions 115.5 centimeters x 116.5 centimeters.

code.name: Pallet, ISO T11
code.description: ISO standard pallet of dimensions 110 centimeters x 110 centimeters, prevalent in Asia - Pacific region.

code.name: Platform, unspecified weight or dimension
code.description: A pallet equivalent shipping platform of unknown dimensions or unknown weight.

code.name: Block
code.description: A solid piece of a hard substance, such as granite, having one or more flat sides.

code.name: Oxygen packed (GS1 Code)
code.description: A package with oxygen added for storage purposes.

code.name: Octabin
code.description: A standard cardboard container of large dimensions for storing for example vegetables, granules of plastics or other dry products.

code.name: Container, outer
code.description: A type of containment box that serves as the outer shipping container, not otherwise specified as transport equipment.

code.name: Pan
code.description: A shallow, wide, open container, usually of metal.

code.name: Packet
code.description: Small package.

code.name: Paper (GS1 Code)
code.description: An indication that the item(s) is packed in paper.

code.name: Pallet, box Combined open-ended box and pallet
Pallet, modular, collars 80cms * 100cms
code.description: Standard sized pallet of dimensions 80 centimeters by 100 centimeters (cms).

code.name: Pallet, modular, collars 80cms * 120cms
code.description: Standard sized pallet of dimensions 80 centimeters by 120 centimeters (cms).

code.name: Pen
code.description: A small open top enclosure for retaining animals.

code.name: Punnet
code.description: GS1 Description: A small shallow basket usually made of plastic.

code.name: Package
code.description: Standard packaging unit.

code.name: Peel pack (GS1 Code)
code.description: A package used for sterile products which may be torn open without touching the product inside.

code.name: Cone shaped paper wrapper (GS1 Code)
code.description: Cone shaped paper wrapping e.g. for an individually packed ice cream cone.

code.name: Piece
code.description: A loose or unpacked article.

code.name: Polypropylene bag (GS1 Code)
code.description: A bag made from polypropylene.

code.name: Receptacle, plastic
code.description: Containment vessel made of plastic for retaining substances or articles.

code.name: Tray packed in plastic (GS1 Code)
code.description: A board with a ring packed in plastic carrying for small articles.

code.name: Pallet
code.description: Platform or open-ended box, usually made of wood, on which goods are retained for ease of mechanical handling during transport and storage.

code.name: Box, wooden, natural wood, with sift proof walls
A wheeled pallet with raised rim (GS1 Code). 81 x 67 x 135 cm (length x width x height).
code.description: A wheeled pallet with raised rim for the storing and transporting of loads.Dimensions: 81 x 67 x 135 cm (length x width x height).

code.name: A Wheeled pallet with raised rim (GS1 Code). 81 x 72 x 135 cm (length x width x height).
code.description: A wheeled pallet with raised rim for the storing and transporting of loads.Dimensions: 81 x 72 x 135 cm (length x width x height).

code.name: Wheeled pallet with raised rim. 81 x 60 x 16 cm (length x width x height). (GS1 Code)
code.description: A wheeled pallet with raised rim for the storing and transporting of loads. Dimensions: 81 x 60 x 16 cm (length x width x height).

code.name: Two sided cage on wheels with fixing strap (GS1 Code) 900 x 770 x 1513 cm (length x width x height)
code.description: A two sided cage mounted on wheels with fixing strap.Dimensions: 900 x 770 x 1513 cm (length x width x height).

code.name: Reel
code.description: Cylindrical rotatory device with a rim at each end on which materials are wound.

code.name: Rednet
code.description: Containment material made of red mesh netting for retaining articles (e.g. trees).

code.name: Article Surveillance (GS1 Code)
code.description: Equipped with article surveillance.

code.name: Skid
code.description: A low movable platform or pallet to facilitate the handling and transport of goods.

code.name: Slipsheet
code.description: Hard plastic sheeting primarily used as the base on which to stack goods to optimise the space within a container. May be used as an alternative to a palletized packaging.

code.name: Spool
code.description: A packaging container used in the transport of such items as wire, cable, tape and yarn.

code.name: Stick (GS1 Code)
code.description: A container for dispensing solid substances, e.g. glue, deodorant.

code.name: Shrinkwrapped
code.description: Goods retained in a transparent plastic film that has been wrapped around and then shrunk tightly on to the goods.

code.name: Sleeve
code.description: GS1 Description: A non-rigid container made of paper, cardboard or plastic that is open-ended and is slid over the contents for protection or presentation.

code.name: Tablet
code.description: A loose or unpacked article in the form of a bar, block or piece. GS1 Description: A small rectangular package of aluminium foil or paper, e.g. a tablet of chocolate.

code.name: Tyre
code.description: A ring made of rubber and/or metal surrounding a wheel.

code.name: Tamper evident package (GS1 Code)
code.description: A type of package giving easy or immediate recognition that the package has been tampered with after it has been sealed.

code.name: Tank container, generic
code.description: A specially constructed container for transporting liquids and gases in bulk.

code.name: Three pack (GS1 Code)
code.description: A package containing three products.

code.name: Trolley (GS1 Code)
code.description: A low cart for the transportation and storage of groceries, milk, etc.

code.name: Bag, tote
code.description: A capacious bag or basket.

code.name: Tube, standing (GS1 Code)
code.description: A screw-topped pliable cylinder capable of standing and suitable for holding pastes or semi-liquids, e.g. a tube of toothpaste.

code.name: Tube, with nozzle
code.description: A tube made of plastic, metal or cardboard fitted with a nozzle, containing a liquid or semi-liquid product, e.g. silicon.

code.name: Pallet, triwall
code.description: A lightweight pallet made from heavy duty corrugated board.

code.name: Two pack (GS1 Code)
code.description: A package containing two products

code.name: Unit
code.description: A type of package composed of a single item or object, not otherwise specified as a unit of transport equipment.

code.name: Tube net (GS1 Code)
code.description: A plastic or textile tube suitable for carrying loose products, e.g. fruit.

code.name: Vanpack
code.description: A type of wooden crate.

code.name: Vehicle
code.description: A self-propelled means of conveyance.

code.name: Bulk, scrap metal
code.description: Loose or unpacked scrap metal transported in bulk form.

code.name: Intermediate bulk container
code.description: A reusable container made of metal, plastic, textile, wood or composite materials used to facilitate transportation of bulk solids and liquids in manageable volumes.

code.name: Intermediate bulk container, steel, pressurised > 10 kpa
Intermediate bulk container, aluminium, pressurised > 10 kpa
Intermediate bulk container, metal, pressure 10 kpa
Intermediate bulk container, woven plastic, without coat/liner
Intermediate bulk container, woven plastic, coated
Intermediate bulk container, woven plastic, with liner
Intermediate bulk container, woven plastic, coated and liner
Wrapper (GS1 Code)
code.description: Wrapping e.g. for an individually packed ice cream.

code.name: Intermediate bulk container, textile without coat/liner
Intermediate bulk container, natural wood, with inner liner
Intermediate bulk container, textile, with liner
Intermediate bulk container, textile, coated and liner
Intermediate bulk container, plywood, with inner liner
Intermediate bulk container, reconstituted wood, with inner liner
Banded package (GS1 Code)
code.description: A package with bands, usually metal or nylon, round it to hold the products together.

code.name: Cardboard package with grip holes for bottles (GS1 Code)
code.description: Cardboard package with a number of holes. Each hole is to be gripped tightly around the neck of a bottle.

code.name: Oneway pallet ISO 0 - 1/2 EURO Pallet (GS1 temporary Code)
code.description: Oneway pallet with dimensions 80 X 60 cm.

code.name: Oneway pallet ISO 1 - 1/1 EURO Pallet (GS1 temporary Code)
code.description: Oneway pallet with dimensions 80 X 120 cm.

code.name: Oneway pallet ISO 2 - 2/1 EURO Pallet (GS1 temporary Code)
code.description: Oneway pallet with dimensions 100 X 120 cm.

code.name: Pallet with exceptional dimensions (GS1 temporary Code)
code.description: Pallet with non-standard dimensions

code.name: Parcel with exceptional dimensions (GS1 temporary Code)
code.description: Parcel with non-standard dimensions

code.name: Standard stack of stones (GS1 Code)
code.description: Standard stack of stones.

code.name: Bag, woven plastic, without inner coat/liner
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in steel drum
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in steel crate box
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in aluminium drum
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in aluminium crate
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in wooden box
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in plywood drum
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in plywood box
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in fibre drum
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in fibreboard box
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in plastic drum
Composite packaging, plastic receptacle in solid plastic box
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in steel drum
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in steel crate box
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in aluminium drum
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in aluminium crate
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in wooden box
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in plywood drum
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in wickerwork hamper
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in fibre drum
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in fibreboard box
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in expandable plastic pack
Composite packaging, glass receptacle in solid plastic pack
Bag, large
code.description: GS1 Description: A non-rigid container made of fabric, paper, plastic, etc, with an opening at the top which can be closed and which is suitable for use on pallets.

code.name: Intermediate bulk container, paper, multi-wall, water resistant
Intermediate bulk container, rigid plastic, with structural equipment, solids
Intermediate bulk container, rigid plastic, freestanding, solids
Intermediate bulk container, rigid plastic, with structural equipment, pressurised
Intermediate bulk container, rigid plastic, freestanding, pressurised
Intermediate bulk container, rigid plastic, with structural equipment, liquids
Intermediate bulk container, rigid plastic, freestanding, liquids
Intermediate bulk container, composite, rigid plastic, solids
Intermediate bulk container, composite, flexible plastic, solids

Intermediate bulk container, composite, flexible plastic, pressurised
